name: Age of Conan: Rise of the Godslayer
name_original: Age of Conan: Rise of the Godslayer
description:
Age of Conan: Rise of the Godslayer is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Funcom. It came out on 11-05-2010. Funcom published the game. Age of Conan: Rise of the Godslayer has a Metascore of 83, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Age of Conan: Rise of the Godslayer is available on PC.
